full_text:
Page 1522
Draft language
From Hugh Hurwitz
To Ray Ormond, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/08/11 21:33
Subject: Draft language
Attachments: TEXT.htm
(b)(5); (b)(7)(C)
is discussed, several options are below. Please note that we should discuss timing of all this. I will need to ensure staff are notified first, and I should let my Executive Staff know so they are not taken off guard as they will no doubt get a lot of questions from their staff and other wardens. Also note that the Warden just called Ray and told him the US Attorney is meeting with him at 10 am tomorrow. So this probably should be some time after that interview.
(b)(5)
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Page 6829
DOJ-OGR-00025614

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email discussing draft language and timing of notifications. The email is from Hugh Hurwitz to Ray Ormond, dated August 11, 2019. Some parts of the text are redacted, indicated by (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and (b)(5).
